comment._content:
Figures sitting on top of the bales have been removed from the negative to create a clear skyline above the bales.  The lower halves of their bodies can still be seen

Could be worthwhile having a good look at the glass plate negative for this one.

I had some help.  It's in a book about Kerry's photographs.

Much easier if you know were to look.
